front.title: Terminology for describing network policy and services

abstract.t: The purpose of this draft is to define an information model thatdescribes the attributes common to the forwarding characteristics ofDifferentiated Services QoS and RSVP. Once this information model isdefined, then a separate draft can be written to refine the coreinformation model defined in the Policy Framework working group tomodel policies that control the configuration of DS-capable networkdevices. This approach enables the definition of policies that can beused to define Services for DiffServ-capable devices and networks.
